products.name: ProGuard Industrial Safety Helmet - White
products.description: Heavy-duty industrial safety helmet designed for construction, mining, and industrial environments. Features a 6-point suspension system for superior comfort and impact protection. ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E certified.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E

data.text: Superior Impact Protection

The ProGuard Industrial Safety Helmet is engineered to provide maximum protection in demanding work environments. The high-density polyethylene (HDPE) shell absorbs and distributes impact forces, reducing the risk of head injuries from falling objects and accidental bumps.
Key Features

items: Accessory slots for face shields and earmuffs
Rain trough channels water away from face

data.text: Applications

Ideal for construction sites, manufacturing facilities, warehouses, mining operations, and any environment where head protection is required. The white color is perfect for supervisors and visitors, providing high visibility while maintaining a professional appearance.

products.name: ProGuard Industrial Safety Helmet - Yellow
products.description: Heavy-duty industrial safety helmet designed for construction, mining, and industrial environments. Features a 6-point suspension system for superior comfort and impact protection. ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E certified.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E

data.text: High Visibility Safety

The bright yellow color of this ProGuard helmet ensures maximum visibility on busy job sites. Combined with the same rugged construction and comfort features as our white model, this helmet is the go-to choice for general laborers and equipment operators.

data.caption: High-visibility yellow for job site safety

data.text: Built for All-Day Comfort

The 6-point suspension system evenly distributes the helmet's weight across your head, reducing pressure points and fatigue during long shifts. The ratchet adjustment allows for quick, one-handed sizing adjustments even while wearing gloves.

products.name: VentMax Breathable Safety Helmet
products.description: Ventilated safety helmet with integrated air channels for maximum airflow in hot working conditions. Lightweight ABS shell with moisture-wicking sweatband. Ideal for outdoor construction and warehouse work.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class C

data.text: Stay Cool Under Pressure

Working in hot conditions? The VentMax Breathable Safety Helmet features 8 strategically placed ventilation channels that promote continuous airflow, keeping your head up to 20% cooler than traditional hard hats.
Lightweight Design

At just 290 grams, the VentMax is one of the lightest safety helmets in its class. The ABS plastic shell provides excellent impact protection without the weight penalty, reducing neck strain during extended wear.

items: Perfect for outdoor work in summer
ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class C certified

products.name: EliteGuard Premium Safety Helmet with Visor
products.description: Premium safety helmet with integrated retractable clear visor for eye protection. Features padded comfort liner, chin strap, and reflective strips for low-light visibility. Perfect for supervisors and site managers.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type II Class E

data.text: All-In-One Head & Eye Protection

The EliteGuard Premium Safety Helmet combines head protection with integrated eye protection in one sleek package. The retractable clear polycarbonate visor flips up when not needed and locks down securely when protection is required.
Premium Comfort Features

items: Adjustable chin strap for secure fit

data.text: Type II Protection

Unlike standard Type I helmets that only protect against top impacts, the EliteGuard is rated Type II, providing protection against lateral (side) impacts as well. This makes it ideal for confined spaces and areas with overhead and side hazards.

data.caption: Type II rated for top and side impact protection

products.name: ClearView Full Face Shield - Anti-Fog
products.description: Crystal clear polycarbonate face shield with anti-fog coating and adjustable headgear. Provides full-face protection against splashes, debris, and airborne particles. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.

data.text: Crystal Clear Protection

The ClearView Full Face Shield provides comprehensive facial protection without compromising visibility. The optical-grade polycarbonate visor offers distortion-free viewing, while the anti-fog coating ensures clear vision even in humid conditions.
Versatile Protection

items: Guards against flying debris and particles
Ideal for grinding, cutting, and chemical handling
Can be worn with safety glasses for double protection

data.text: The adjustable ratchet headgear fits head sizes from 52-64cm, ensuring a comfortable and secure fit for most users. The foam forehead cushion absorbs sweat and reduces pressure during extended wear.

products.name: ClearView Face Shield with Chin Guard
products.description: Enhanced face shield with extended chin guard for additional protection. Features replaceable visor system and foam forehead cushion. Ideal for grinding, cutting, and chemical handling applications.

data.text: Extended Coverage Protection

When standard face shields aren't enough, the ClearView Face Shield with Chin Guard provides that extra layer of protection. The integrated polypropylene chin guard extends coverage to protect your neck and chin from splashes and debris.

data.caption: Extended chin guard for complete protection

data.text: Replaceable Visor System

The visor is designed to be easily replaceable without tools. When your visor becomes scratched or damaged, simply pop it out and snap in a new one. This extends the life of your headgear and reduces long-term costs.

products.name: ProShield Helmet-Mounted Face Shield
products.description: Universal face shield designed to attach to standard safety helmets. Features flip-up design for easy visor positioning. Compatible with most ANSI-rated hard hats.

data.text: Add Face Protection to Your Hard Hat

The ProShield Helmet-Mounted Face Shield easily attaches to standard hard hat accessory slots, adding face protection without the need for separate headgear. The flip-up design allows you to raise the visor when not needed while keeping it readily accessible.

data.caption: Universal mounting fits most hard hats

data.text: Quick & Easy Installation

items: Locate the accessory slots on your hard hat
Insert the mounting brackets into the slots
Snap the face shield onto the brackets
Adjust the visor angle as needed

data.text: Compatible with most ANSI-rated hard hats including models from 3M, MSA, Honeywell, and more. Check your hard hat for standard accessory slots before purchasing.

products.name: WeldMaster Auto-Darkening Welding Helmet
products.description: Professional auto-darkening welding helmet with 1/25000s reaction time. Features adjustable shade range DIN 9-13, solar-powered with backup battery. Large 100x93mm viewing area for excellent visibility.

data.text: Professional Auto-Darkening Technology

The WeldMaster Auto-Darkening Welding Helmet revolutionizes your welding experience with lightning-fast 1/25000 second reaction time. The moment you strike an arc, the lens darkens to protect your eyes, then returns to the light state when the arc stops.
4-Sensor Arc Detection

Four independently operating arc sensors ensure reliable detection from any angle. Even when one sensor is blocked by your workpiece or torch position, the remaining sensors maintain protection. This eliminates dangerous flash incidents.

items: Large viewing area for better visibility

data.text: Ideal For
Perfect for MIG, TIG, Stick, and Plasma cutting applications. The adjustable shade range (DIN 9-13) covers most common welding processes and amperage settings.

products.name: WeldMaster Pro Variable Shade Helmet
products.description: Top-of-the-line welding helmet with TRUE COLOR technology for accurate color representation. Extended shade range DIN 5-13, perfect for TIG, MIG, and Stick welding. Includes grinding mode.

data.text: TRUE COLOR Technology

Experience welding like never before with TRUE COLOR lens technology. Unlike traditional green-tinted welding lenses, TRUE COLOR provides a more natural view of your weld puddle and surrounding area, allowing for more precise work and better color differentiation.

data.caption: TRUE COLOR lens for natural color representation

data.text: Extended Shade Range

With a shade range of DIN 5-9 and 9-13, this helmet handles everything from low-amperage TIG welding to high-amperage Stick and Gouging. The separate grind mode (DIN 3.5) lets you switch to grinding without changing helmets.

data.caption: Side control panel for easy adjustments

data.text: The TRUE COLOR lens changed my welding game. I can finally see exactly what's happening in the weld puddle.
data.caption: Professional Welder Review

products.name: BasicWeld Passive Welding Helmet
products.description: Economy passive welding helmet with fixed DIN 10 shade lens. Durable PP shell with flip-up design. Great for occasional welding and DIY projects.

data.text: Reliable & Affordable Protection

The BasicWeld Passive Welding Helmet proves that quality eye protection doesn't have to break the bank. With a fixed DIN 10 shade lens and durable polypropylene shell, this helmet provides reliable protection for occasional welders and DIY enthusiasts.
Flip-Up Convenience
The flip-up design allows you to raise the lens to inspect your work or prepare your next weld without removing the helmet. Simply flip down when you're ready to strike the arc.

items: Fixed DIN 10 shade - no batteries needed
Great for MIG and Stick welding

products.name: SafeWork Ventilated Bump Cap - Navy
products.description: Lightweight bump cap with breathable mesh panels and internal ABS shell insert. Protects against minor bumps and scrapes in low-risk environments. Baseball cap style for casual appearance.

data.text: Protection Meets Style

The SafeWork Ventilated Bump Cap provides protection against minor head bumps while maintaining a casual, non-industrial appearance. The baseball cap style makes it perfect for retail, warehousing, and light manufacturing environments.
Hidden Protection
Inside the comfortable cotton/polyester outer shell is a rigid ABS plastic insert that absorbs and distributes impact forces. The insert is removable for easy washing of the outer cap.

products.name: SafeWork Ventilated Bump Cap - Black
products.description: Lightweight bump cap with breathable mesh panels and internal ABS shell insert. Protects against minor bumps and scrapes in low-risk environments. Baseball cap style for casual appearance.

data.text: Classic Black Design

The SafeWork Bump Cap in classic black offers the same great protection as our navy model with a versatile color that matches any work uniform. The understated design ensures employees wear their protection without feeling self-conscious.
Ideal Applications
Note: Bump caps are designed for low-risk environments only. For areas with falling object hazards, use a full safety helmet rated to ANSI Z89.1 or equivalent.

products.name: IndustrialPro Bump Cap with LED Light
products.description: Advanced bump cap with integrated rechargeable LED headlight. Features 3 brightness modes and USB charging. Perfect for warehouse workers and maintenance technicians.

data.text: See & Be Seen

The IndustrialPro Bump Cap combines head protection with hands-free lighting in one convenient package. The integrated 200-lumen LED light illuminates your work area while keeping your hands free for the task at hand.
USB-C Rechargeable
No more buying batteries! The built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery charges via USB-C and provides 4-8 hours of runtime depending on brightness mode. Charge it at your desk or in your vehicle.

products.name: FlameShield Welding Protective Hood
products.description: Heavy-duty leather protective hood for welding and cutting operations. Full head, neck, and shoulder coverage. Features adjustable elastic band and reinforced seams for durability.

data.text: Premium Leather Protection

The FlameShield Welding Protective Hood is crafted from premium split cowhide leather, providing superior protection against sparks, spatter, and radiant heat. Worn under your welding helmet, it protects the areas your helmet doesn't cover.
Full Coverage Design

The extended design covers your head, neck, and shoulders - the areas most vulnerable to sparks and spatter when welding. The elastic band and Velcro closure ensure a secure fit that won't slip during work.

products.name: ArcGuard FR Cotton Protective Hood
products.description: Flame-resistant cotton balaclava hood for arc flash and welding protection. Breathable design with face opening. Can be worn under welding helmets for added protection.

data.text: Arc Flash Protection

The ArcGuard FR Cotton Hood provides essential protection against arc flash incidents. With an ATPV rating of 12 cal/cm², it meets the requirements for many HRC 2 electrical work tasks as defined by NFPA 70E.

data.caption: FR treated cotton for arc flash protection

data.text: Comfortable Breathable Design

Made from 100% flame-resistant treated cotton, this hood is breathable and comfortable for extended wear. The balaclava style with face opening allows you to wear safety glasses and respirators while maintaining head and neck protection.

items: Can be worn under hard hat or welding helmet

products.name: ChemPro Chemical Resistant Hood
products.description: Disposable chemical-resistant hood for hazardous material handling. Microporous film laminate provides barrier against liquid splashes and particulates. Elastic face opening for secure fit.

data.text: Disposable Chemical Protection

The ChemPro Chemical Resistant Hood provides an effective barrier against liquid splashes and hazardous particulates. Designed for single-use applications, it ensures consistent protection without the risk of cross-contamination from reused equipment.
Microporous Technology
The microporous film laminate allows air and moisture vapor to pass through while blocking hazardous liquids and particles. This keeps you protected while remaining breathable and comfortable.

items: Elastic face opening for secure fit
Covers head, neck, and upper shoulders

data.text: Recommended Applications

products.name: CoolMax Summer Safety Helmet
products.description: Ultra-ventilated safety helmet designed for hot weather conditions. Features 12 large ventilation ports and CoolMax sweat-wicking liner. Reduces heat buildup by up to 30%.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class C

data.text: Beat the Heat

Working in summer heat is challenging enough without a hot, stuffy hard hat making it worse. The CoolMax Summer Safety Helmet features 12 large ventilation ports that promote constant airflow, reducing internal temperatures by up to 30%.
CoolMax Technology

The removable CoolMax liner actively wicks moisture away from your skin, keeping you dry and comfortable. When the liner gets saturated, simply remove it, wring it out, and it continues working. Machine washable for easy maintenance.

items: Up to 30% cooler than standard helmets

products.name: HiVis Reflective Safety Helmet
products.description: High-visibility safety helmet with 360-degree reflective strips for maximum visibility in low-light conditions. Bright fluorescent yellow color meets highway work zone requirements.

specifications.name: Certification
specifications.value: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E, ANSI 107

data.text: Maximum Visibility

The HiVis Reflective Safety Helmet combines head protection with high-visibility features for workers in roadway construction, airports, and other environments where being seen is critical. The fluorescent yellow shell is visible during the day, while 360° reflective strips ensure visibility at night.
Meets Highway Work Zone Standards

This helmet meets ANSI 107 high-visibility requirements in addition to ANSI Z89.1 impact protection standards. The 3M Scotchlite reflective material is the same trusted brand used on emergency vehicle markings.

items: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class E certified
Ideal for roadway and airport workers
